name: Switching Domains
description: Transitioning from one development domain to another - apply existing knowledge efficiently
user_situation: I'm a [X] developer learning [Y] and need to understand what's different
objectives: Identify what knowledge transfers vs what's domain-specific
Learn domain-specific patterns and anti-patterns quickly
Avoid beginner mistakes while leveraging expertise
Build on existing skills rather than starting from scratch

common_mistakes: Not versioning data and models together

journey_steps.why: Understand how users interact with systems in the new domain
reflection_questions: How do user workflows differ from your current domain?
What are the unique constraints of this domain?
What assumptions from your current domain don't apply?

journey_steps.why: Learn which architectural patterns work in this domain and why
focus_areas: Identify common patterns in the new domain
Understand why certain patterns are preferred
Map familiar patterns to new domain equivalents

journey_steps.why: Learn idiomatic code for the new domain and ecosystem
immediate_actions: Study well-regarded open source projects in the domain
Learn domain-specific linting and formatting tools
Understand community conventions and style guides

journey_steps.why: Adapt testing strategies to domain-specific needs

domain_differences.mobile: Device testing, UI automation, offline scenarios
domain_differences.ml: Data validation, model evaluation, drift detection
domain_differences.microservices: Contract testing, integration testing, chaos engineering

do: Build a small project in the new domain
Read production code from established projects
Find a mentor familiar with the domain
dont: Try to directly translate old patterns to new domain
Over-engineer based on old domain complexity

completion_criteria: Can identify what knowledge transfers and what doesn't
Know common pitfalls and how to avoid them
Can write idiomatic code in the new domain

recommended_projects.backend_to_frontend: Build a todo app with modern framework (React/Vue/Svelte)
recommended_projects.web_to_mobile: Create simple note-taking app for iOS and Android
recommended_projects.traditional_to_ml: Implement basic ML model (classification or regression) with deployment
recommended_projects.monolith_to_microservices: Split a simple monolith into 2-3 services

next_steps_after_journey: Follow Specialist Expanding persona path for comprehensive coverage
Deep dive into domain-specific examples in /examples/domain-specific/
Build increasingly complex projects in new domain
Consider contributing to open source in the new domain
